meanings.sent1: The warworn soldier's uniform was tattered and torn.
meanings.sent2: The village bore the scars of warworn buildings and broken streets.
meanings.sent3: The warworn flag fluttered in the breeze, telling tales of battles long past.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes, warworn from witnessing the horrors of conflict, held a deep sadness.
meanings.sent5: The warworn landscape echoed the cries of those who had fought and suffered there.

meanings.sent1: The warworn faces of the refugees spoke of the hardships they had endured.
meanings.sent2: The warworn monuments stood as reminders of the sacrifices made in battle.
meanings.sent3: The warworn streets whispered stories of bravery and resilience in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent4: His warworn hands trembled as he recounted the memories of combat.
meanings.sent5: The warworn expressions of the veterans reflected the weight of their experiences.
